body:
Some minor nits:
  * Change "A simple class to..." to something like "A simple class representing the version of the backing library, to..."
  * Put "too perfect forwarding" in quotes
  * Change "at gcc6+ compilers" to "in gcc 6+"
  * End sentence in period.
